contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox District DE | name=Sömmerda | state=Thuringia | capital=[[Sömmerda]] | area=804 | Kreisschlüssel = 16068 | population=79,592 | population_as_of=2002 | density=99 | carsign=SÖM | url= [http://www.landkreis-soemmerda.de landkreis-soemmerda.de] | map=thuringia_soem.png }} '''Sömmerda''' is a ''Kreis'' ([[districts of Germany|district]]) in the north of [[Thuringia]], [[Germany]]. Neighboring districts are (from the north clockwise) the districts [[Kyffhäuserkreis]], the [[Burgenlandkreis]] in [[Saxony-Anhalt]], the district [[Weimarer Land]] and the district-free city [[Erfurt]], and the districts [[Gotha (district)|Gotha]] and [[Unstrut-Hainich]]. ==History== The district Sömmerda was created in 1952. In 1994 the districts of Thuringia were reorganized, and the district Sömmerda was enlarged significantly by adding municipalities from the dissolved districts Artern and Erfurt-Land. <!--==Partnerships==--> ==Geography== The main river in the district is the [[Unstrut]]. ==Coat of arms== {| |- valign=top ||[[Image:Wappen Landkreis Sömmerda.svg|130px|Coat of arms]] ||The coat of arms shows the three historic states which Sömmerda belonged to in the past. In the left is the [[Saxony|Saxon]] symbol, to the right is the lion as symbol of Thuringia, and in the bottom is the [[Wheel of Mainz]] as the symbol of [[Mainz]]. |} ==Towns and municipalities== {| |----- !''Verwaltungsgemeinschaft''-free towns!!and municipalities |- |valign=top| #[[Rastenberg]] #[[Sömmerda]] #[[Weißensee, Thuringia|Weißensee]] || #[[Elxleben]] #[[Witterda]] |} {| ! colspan=3|[[Verwaltungsgemeinschaft]]en |- valign=top || '''1. [[Straußfurt (Verwaltungsgemeinschaft)|Straußfurt]]''' #[[Gangloffsömmern]] #[[Haßleben]] #[[Henschleben]] #[[Riethnordhausen]] #[[Schwerstedt, Sömmerda|Schwerstedt]] #[[Straußfurt]]<sup>1</sup> #[[Werningshausen]] #[[Wundersleben]] |- |colspan=3 align=center|<sup>1</sup>seat of the Verwaltungsgemeinschaft;<sup>2</sup>town |} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.landkreis-soemmerda.de Official website] (German) {{Germany districts thuringia}} {{Coord|51.17|11.17|display=title|format=dms}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Sommerda (District)}} [[Category:Districts of Thuringia]]
